Texts.Chs: 我正在搞一个全新闪亮的机甲武器，但是我需要有人帮我找些零件。如果你能给我找来5个^orange;耐钢锭^white;和^green;1 个^orange;高级电路^white;，我想这些足以完成工作了！
Texts.Eng: I'm working on a shiny new mech weapon, but I need some help gathering some pieces. If you could ^green;find me 4^orange; durasteel bars^white; and ^green;an ^orange;advanced circuit^white;, I think that'll be enough to finish it!
